attributes.action: Create a Social Housing Fund by replacing stamp duty on the purchase of a house with a profit-related tax on the sale price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has two aims :

1/  to divert tax raised on the sale and purchase of houses from the Consolidated Fund to a dedicated Social Housing Fund

2/  to change the tax from a percentage of the purchase price to a percentage of the profit realised on the sale
